command_group: az palo-alto cloudngfw firewall status default
description: Manage cloudngfw firewall status default resource.

commands.name: az palo-alto cloudngfw firewall status default show
commands.syntax:
az palo-alto cloudngfw firewall status default show [--firewall-name]
                                                    [--ids]
                                                    [--resource-group]
                                                    [--subscription]
examples: az palo-alto cloudngfw firewall status default show --resource-group MyResourceGroup -n MyCloudngfwFirewall
